sentences.sContent: He wasn't about to blemish that pristine record.
sentences.sCn: 他不想破坏那完美的记录。

remMethod.val: blem(弄伤) + ish → 把…弄伤 → 损害； 玷污

trans.tranOther: to spoil the beauty or appearance of something, so that it is not perfect
a small mark, especially a mark on someone’s skin or on the surface of an object, that spoils its appearance
